text: akkaranattal israyil santatikalkk nam iprakaram vidhinalkukayuntayi: marrearale keannatin pakaramayea, bhumiyil kulappamuntakkiyatinre perilea allate vallavanum orale kealappetuttiyal, at manusyare muluvan kealappetuttiyatin tulyamakunnu. oralute jivan vallavanum raksiccal, at manusyarute muluvan jivan raksiccatin tulyamakunnu. nam'mute dutanmar vyaktamaya telivukalumayi avarute (israyilyarute) atutt cennittunt‌. ennitt atinu sesam avaril dharalam per bhumiyil atikramam pravartticcukeantirikkukayan‌
